attributes.action: Ban the burning of garden waste
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We're entitled to clean air, so why are bonfires still allowed ? They make our clothes smell of smoke, and are bad for asthma sufferers. We have to keep our windows closed, and can't enjoy being in our own garden.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
